select ch.id id, ch.real_host_id, ch.host_name, ch.account, ch.type, ch.cpu_core, ch.memory, ch.sys_disk, ch.data_disk, ch.bandwidth, ch.is_auto_startup, ch.running_status, ch.status, ch.inner_ip, ch.inner_port, ch.outer_ip, ch.outer_port, ch.region from cloud_host ch where ch.status=1 and ch.real_host_id is not null and ch.id not in (select host_id from cloud_host_bill_detail where end_time is null)

select count(1) from cloud_host ch left join cloud_host_shopping_config config on ch.id=config.host_id left join sys_disk_image sd on ch.sys_image_id = sd.id where ch.user_id = #{userId} and ch.status!=4 and ch.type !=5 and ch.type !=6

select count(1) from cloud_host ch join terminal_user t on ch.user_id = t.id where t.belonging_id = #{userId} and ch.status!=4

select ch.id, ch.real_host_id, ch.type, ch.host_name, ch.cpu_core, ch.memory, ch.sys_image_id, ch.sys_image_name, ch.sys_disk, ch.data_disk, ch.bandwidth, ch.running_status, ch.status, ch.is_auto_startup, ch.inner_ip, ch.outer_ip, ch.region from cloud_host ch where ch.region = #{region} and ch.display_name = #{displayName} and ch.status!=4
